line_1: If you this needful task perform,
line_2: You'll make your mansion dry and warm;

line_1: And, pleas'd th' Almighty's Orders to perform,
line_2: Rides in the Whirl-wind, and directs the Storm.

line_1: When they their little Studies must perform;
line_2: And when the Time is come for their Return,

line_1: O Ladies! what cannot our sex perform? —
line_2: A bustling woman lives thro' every storm.
But more than meet the gathering Storm.

line_1: That he, To-Morrow, will that Vow perform.
line_2: Agen he Swears, to shun the present Storm,
